TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi serializable beforefieldinit SortedSet`1<T> extends System.Object implements class System.Collections.Generic.ICollection`1<!T>, class System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable`1<!T>, class System.Collections.Generic.IReadOnlyCollection`1<!T>, class System.Collections.Generic.ISet`1<!T>, class System.Collections.ICollection, class System.Collections.IEnumerable, class System.Runtime.Serialization.IDeserializationCallback, class System.Runtime.Serialization.ISerializable
Public Class SortedSet(Of T) Implements ICollection, ICollection(Of T), IDeserializationCallback, IEnumerable(Of T), IReadOnlyCollection(Of T), ISerializable, ISet(Of T)

generic <typename T> public ref class SortedSet : System::Collections::Generic::ICollection<T>, System::Collections::Generic::IEnumerable<T>, System::Collections::Generic::IReadOnlyCollection<T>, System::Collections::Generic::ISet<T>, System::Collections::ICollection, System::Runtime::Serialization::IDeserializationCallback, System::Runtime::Serialization::ISerializable

span.span: The type of elements in the set.

summary.span: 表示按排序顺序维护的对象的集合。

span.span: Represents a collection of objects that is maintained in sorted order.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 对象在插入和删除元素时维护排序顺序，而不会影响性能。A object maintains a sorted order without affecting performance as elements are inserted and deleted. 不允许重复的元素。Duplicate elements are not allowed. 不支持更改现有项的排序值，这可能导致意外行为。Changing the sort values of existing items is not supported and may lead to unexpected behavior. 有关 的线程安全替代，请参阅 For a thread safe alternative to , see ## Examples 下面的示例演示使用采用的构造函数创建的类作为参数。The following example demonstrates a class that is created with the constructor that takes an as a parameter. 此比较器 (`ByFileExtension`) 用于文件名的列表进行排序，通过其扩展名。This comparer (`ByFileExtension`) is used to sort a list of file names by their extensions. 此示例演示如何创建一组排序的媒体文件名称、 删除不需要的元素、 查看的一系列元素，和将组与另一排序的集进行比较。This example demonstrates how to create a sorted set of media file names, remove unwanted elements, view a range of elements, and compare the set with another sorted set. [!code-csharp[System.Collections.Generic.SortedSet#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.collections.generic.sortedset/cs/program.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Collections.Generic.SortedSet#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.collections.generic.sortedset/vb/program.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 可枚举集合中的重复元素不会复制到的新实例引发类和任何异常。Duplicate elements in the enumerable collection are not copied into the new instance of the class, and no exceptions are thrown. 此构造函数是 O(`n` log `n`) 运算，其中 `n` 是 `collection` 参数中的元素的数量。This constructor is an O(`n` log `n`) operation, where `n` is the number of elements in the `collection` parameter.

remarks.format: ## Remarks `memberEqualityComparer`和当前必须具有相同的定义的相等性。The `memberEqualityComparer` and the current must have the same definition of equality. 你可以使用此方法中返回的比较器构造函数来创建各个集的哈希表。You can use the comparer returned by this method in the constructor to create a hash table of individual sets. ## Examples 下面的示例使用方法来创建一组集。The following example uses the method to create a set of sets. 此代码示例摘自更大的示例为提供类。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the class. remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法中任何元素移除在当前这也是在`other`。This method removes any element in the current that is also in `other`. 中的重复值`other`将被忽略。Duplicate values in `other` are ignored. 此方法为 O (`n`) 操作，其中`n`是中的元素数`other`参数。This method is an O(`n`) operation, where `n` is the number of elements in the `other` parameter. ## Examples 下面的示例从另一个排序集内重复的排序集中移除元素。The following example removes elements from a sorted set that are duplicated in another sorted set. 此代码示例摘自更大的示例为提供类。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the class. summary.span: 返回循环访问 的枚举数。

span.span: Returns an enumerator that iterates through the .

returns.span: 返回一个按顺序循环访问 的枚举器。

span.span: An enumerator that iterates through the in sorted order.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 只要集合保持不变，枚举数就保持有效。An enumerator remains valid as long as the collection remains unchanged. 如果对集合进行更改，例如添加、 修改或删除元素，则枚举数将失效且不可恢复失效，并且下次调用或引发。If changes are made to the collection, such as adding, modifying, or deleting elements, the enumerator is irrecoverably invalidated and the next call to or throws an . 如果调用之间修改集合方法和获取的值属性，返回到，设置的元素，即使枚举数已经无效。If the collection is modified between calling method and obtaining the value of the property, returns the element that it is set to, even if the enumerator is already invalidated. 此方法为 O(log n) 运算。This method is an O(log n) operation.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法返回的元素介于范围的视图`lowerValue`和`upperValue`，如比较器的定义。This method returns a view of the range of elements that fall between `lowerValue` and `upperValue`, as defined by the comparer. 此方法不会复制中的元素，但提供的窗口，插入基础本身。This method does not copy elements from the , but provides a window into the underlying itself. 你可以进行更改，这两个视图中并在基础。You can make changes in both the view and in the underlying . ## Examples 下面的示例使用方法以仅列出 AVI 文件从一组排序的媒体文件的名称。The following example uses the method to list only the AVI files from a sorted set of media file names. 比较器的计算结果根据其扩展名的文件名。The comparer evaluates file names according to their extensions. `lowerValue`是"AVI"和`upperValue`更高版本，只有一个值"AVJ"，以获取所有 AVI 文件的视图。The `lowerValue` is "AVI" and the `upperValue` is only one value higher, "AVJ", to get the view of all AVI files. 此代码示例摘自更大的示例为提供类。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the class. remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法将忽略中的任何重复元素`other`。This method ignores any duplicate elements in `other`. 如果该集合由表示`other`参数是具有的相同的相等比较器，与当前集合对象，此方法为 O (`n`) 操作。If the collection represented by the `other` parameter is a collection with the same equality comparer as the current object, this method is an O(`n`) operation. 否则，此方法为 O (`n` + `m`) 操作，其中`n`是和`m`是中的元素数`other`。Otherwise, this method is an O(`n` + `m`) operation, where `n` is and `m` is the number of elements in `other`.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 空集是任何其他集合的真子集。An empty set is a proper subset of any other collection. 因此，此方法返回`true`如果该集合表示由当前对象为空除非`other`参数也是一个空集。Therefore, this method returns `true` if the collection represented by the current object is empty unless the `other` parameter is also an empty set. 此方法始终返回`false`如果大于或等于的中的元素数`other`。This method always returns `false` if is greater than or equal to the number of elements in `other`. 如果该集合由表示`other`是具有的相同的相等比较器，与当前集合对象，则此方法为 O (`n`) 操作。If the collection represented by `other` is a collection with the same equality comparer as the current object, then this method is an O(`n`) operation. 否则，此方法为 O (`n` + `m`) 操作，其中`n`是和`m`是中的元素数`other`。Otherwise, this method is an O(`n` + `m`) operation, where `n` is and `m` is the number of elements in `other`.

summary.span: 获取一个值，该值指示 是否为只读。

span.span: Gets a value that indicates whether a is read-only.

value.span: 如果该集合为只读，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if the collection is read-only; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此成员是显式的接口成员实现。This member is an explicit interface member implementation. 它只能在 实例强制转换为 接口时使用。It can be used only when the instance is cast to an interface. 在创建只读集合后，该集合不允许添加、移除或修改元素。A collection that is read-only does not allow the addition, removal, or modification of elements after the collection is created. 集合是只读的是只是一个集合与防止集合; 进行修改的包装因此，如果对基础集合进行更改，只读集合将反映这些更改。A collection that is read-only is simply a collection with a wrapper that prevents modifying the collection; therefore, if changes are made to the underlying collection, the read-only collection reflects those changes. 获取此属性的值是一个 o （1） 操作。Getting the value of this property is an O(1) operation.

param.name: equalValue
param.span: 要搜索的值。

span.span: The value to search for.

param.name: actualValue
param.span: 搜索操作在集内找到的值；如果搜索操作未生成任何匹配项，则返回 T 的默认值。

span.span: The value from the set that the search found, or the default value of T when the search yielded no match.

summary.span: 在集内搜索给定的值，并返回所找到的相等值（如果有）。

span.span: Searches the set for a given value and returns the equal value it finds, if any.

returns.span: 一个指示搜索是否成功的值。

span.span: A value indicating whether the search was successful.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 这一点可能很有用，当你想要重新使用以前存储的引用，而不是一个新构造 （以便更多共享的引用可以发生） 或查找虽然具有更完整的数据比当前具有的值的值时其比较器函数指示它们相等。This can be useful when you want to reuse a previously stored reference instead of a newly constructed one (so that more sharing of references can occur) or to look up a value that has more complete data than the value you currently have, although their comparer functions indicate they are equal.

param.name: other
param.span: 要与当前的 对象进行比较的集合。

span.span: The collection to compare to the current object.

summary.span: 修改当前的 对象，使该对象包含当前对象或指定集合中存在的所有元素。

span.span: Modifies the current object so that it contains all elements that are present in either the current object or the specified collection.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 中的元素的任何重复`other`将被忽略。Any duplicate elements in `other` are ignored.
